HUE UI

Getting Started

Getting up and running with Hue UI

Installing
Looking to quickly add Hue to your project?
CSS
Copy-paste the stylesheet <link> into your <head> to load our CSS.
JS
Many of our components require the use of JavaScript to function. Place our script at the end of your page content, right before the closing <body> tag, to enable them.
Starter template
Be sure to have your pages set up with the latest design and development standards. That means using an HTML5 doctype and including a viewport meta tag for proper responsive behaviors. Put it all together and your pages should look like this:
